title: From the St. Lawrence to the North Saskatchewan [microform] : being some incidents connected with the detachment of "A" Battery, Regt. Canadian Artillery, who composed part of the North West Field Force in the Rebellion of 1885
creator: Laidlaw, Alexander
subject: Canada. Canadian Army. Regiment of Canadian Army. "A" Battery
Canada. Armée canadienne. Regiment of Canadian Artillery. "A" Battery
Riel Rebellion, 1885
Riel, Rébellion de, 1885
description: With: Report upon the suppression of the rebellion in the North-West Territories, and matters in connection therewith, in 1885 / Department of Militia and Defence of the Dominion of Canada. Ottawa, 1886. --Report of the commissioner of the North-West Mounted Police Force, 1885. Ottawa, 1886. --Le 9me Bataillon au Nord-Ouest (journal d'un militaire) / par George Beauregard. Québec, 1886. --The Queen vs. Louis Riel, accused and convicted of the crime of high treason. Ottawa, 1886. --Census of the three provisional districts of th e North-West Territories. Ottawa, 1886
Filmed from a copy of the original publication held by the Archives nationales du Québec, Bibliothèque, Québec
notes: Film/Fiche is presented as originally captured.
